roleset.name: poking with a sharp implement

roles.note: Arg3 from verb frame separated into two separate args. Even though co-occuring LOC and resultative args are awkward, there are some examples out there, and regardless, it seemed more useful to be able to differentiate them.

example.name: args 0, 1, 2, 3
example.text: A man's dispute with his girlfriend allegedly led to his stabbing her in the head with a steak knife

example.name: arg 4
example.text: My nephew would not respond to his insults, so he thought that justified his stabbing him to death.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, stab-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls Poison-42.2, Poke-19, Swat-18.2.
